abstract: Exhibit Gilding the Coasts: Art and Design of Long Island’s Great Estates, at  Long Island Museum of American Art, History and Carriages in Stony Brook, traces history of palatial mansions that once lined Long Island's coast (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: An exhibition at the Long Island Museum of American Art, History and Carriages displays lavish furnishings and fine pieces from mostly vanished palatial estates.

headline.main: Precious Objects From Vanishing Estates on Long Island
headline.print_headline: The Gilding of the Gold Coast

snippet: An exhibition at the Long Island Museum of American Art, History and Carriages displays lavish furnishings and fine pieces from mostly vanished palatial estates.
